alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 20 at 7:01PM MDT until July 21 at 8:05AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Fountain affecting El Paso County. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Fountain. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage to 12.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage this evening to 9.9 feet late this evening. It will rise to 10.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.1 feet on 04/30/1999. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 700 AM MDT.
